moduleMetadataJson.name: Unix Command Shell, Bind TCP (via nodejs)
moduleMetadataJson.description: Continually listen for a connection and spawn a command shell via nodejs
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: CreateSession
options.description: Create a new session for every successful login

options.name: InitialAutoRunScript
options.description: An initial script to run on session creation (before AutoRunScript)

options.name: AutoRunScript
options.description: A script to run automatically on session creation.

options.name: CommandShellCleanupCommand
options.description: A command to run before the session is closed
